description: Defines a rate for a given prefix

caller_id_numbers.description: String of caller id prefixes separated by ':'

carrier.description: Friendly name for the carrier providing this rate

direction.description: Apply this rate based on the direction of the call (relative to FreeSWITCH)

internal_rate_cost.description: The per-min rate charged by the upstream provider

iso_country_code.description: Country code this rate applies to

options.description: List of options this rate is good for, to be matched against a customer's options

rate_cost.description: The per-min rate charged to the downstream customer

rate_increment.description: The time slice, in seconds, to bill in.

rate_minimum.description: The minimum time slice, in seconds to bill a call

rate_nocharge_time.description: If the call duration is shorter than this threshold (seconds), the call is not billed

rate_surcharge.description: The upfront cost of connecting the call

ratedeck_id.description: ID of the ratedeck this rate belongs to

routes.description: List of regexps that match valid DIDs for this rate

weight.description: Ordering against other rates, 1 being most preferred, 100 being least preferred
